price: ߊ߲ ߣߊ߬ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ ߓߐ߫ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߞߊ߲߬ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߛߘߊߒߡߊߞߊ߲ ߕߌߢߍ ߘߌ߫
arabic: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: falammā kashafnā ʿanhumu al-ʿadhāba idhā hum yankuthūna
